MANIPULATION DE DONNEES

LET, DATA, READ, RESTORE, DIM
CONTROLE DU DEROULEMENT DE PROGRAMME

IF, FOR, WHILE, REPEAT, DO WHILE, GOTO, GOSUB, DEF FN, ON GOTO
ENTREES / SORTIES

LIST, PRINT, INPUT, TAB, SPC, PLAY
FONCTIONS ARITHMETIQUES

<, >, =, ≤, ≥, !=
FONCTIONS MATHEMATIQUES

ABS, ATN, COS, EXP, INT, LOG, RND, SIN, SQR, TAN, MAX, MIN
FONCTIONS GRAPHIQUES

DRAWSQUARE, DRAWCIRCLE, DRAWTRIANGLE, DRAWRECTANGLE, DRAWLINE, CLEAR
FONCTIONS AUDIO

PLAY
AUTRES

STOP, RETURN, END, LABEL
